title: Celsius to Fahrenheit
description: Convert a temperature from Celsius (`C`) to Fahrenheit (`F`). Formula: $F = C \times 9/5 + 32$. Return the result as an integer.
constraints: Output F must be an integer (truncate/floor if necessary, or let Python handle it).
hints: Ensure your division operation is correct (use 9/5 or 1.8).
Cast the final result to an integer if it is a float.
